```Production  = production_name "=" [ Expression ] "." .

Group       = "(" Expression ")" .

attachments.title: The Go Programming Language Specification - The Go Programming Language
attachments.text: Go is an open source programming language that makes it easy to build simple, reliable, and efficient software.
